text: Ayatollah Mohsen Mojtahed Shabestari (; 1937 – 17 November 2021) was an Iranian Shiite cleric and politician. He was born in Shabestar, Iran. He was a member of the Islamic Consultative Assembly between 1980 until 1988 and again from 1992 until 2000. He was also a member of the Assembly of Experts between 1983 until his death. Shabestari died on 17 November 2021 in Tehran, Iran from cardiac arrest.آیت‌الله محسن مجتهد شبستری درگذشت ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Iranian politicians Category:Iranian clerics
title: Mohsen Mojtahed Shabestari
